Important for MERN Setup.line-10: We use this top-level package.json file to define scripts we can run to control our entire application from the same CLI location
Important for MERN Setup.line-21: The concurrently npm tool allows us to execute two CLI processes... concurrently!

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:server" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run start:client"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.set-up: npm install && npm run build && npm run seed && npm run start:dev
